#summary Tutorial : Floating point error

= How to trace FPU error =

When you developing your OS, if you got an floating point error, it will dump to int 16. Just set a breakpoint on the interrupt handler, when you get there, look at fcs,fip,fdp,fds registers, it will give you some hints.
